items.sentence: If it were not for the sun, there would be no life on the earth.
If he had been with me then, I would not have done such a thing.
Now that you are grown-up, it is up to you to decide what to do.
I heard that our new French teacher just graduated from college.
Tom and I've been talking about going to Boston for a long time.
French isn't taught in our schools the way it used to be taught.
Tom said he thought it would be a waste of time to study French.
We usually stay for about three days every time we go to Boston.
Tom said he knew they might not permit him to do that at school.
Do you think it's fair to judge people by the company they keep?
